answer.explanation: M-Au: Help. My name is Sandeep Prakash and Q1 I’m a reporter for the Ridgedell Times. I’m calling because I’m writing an article about the new production your theater is putting on this weekend. Q2 I saw on your Web site that you don’t allow photography during the performance, and I was wondering whether you’d be willing to make an exception – I’d really like to take some pictures of the sets and actors to publish with my article. Q3 If not, I could come to one of your dress rehearsals. I’ll be out of town tomorrow morning for a celebrity interview, but I’m free to attend a rehearsal any other time this week. Please give me a call back at 555-0152. Thanks, I look forward to hearing from you.

answer.explanation: Welcome to our quarterly staff meeting. First, I want to encourage you to read the business section in today’s Newville Times. Q1 You’ll see there that we received the award for the best household moving company in the area! But keep mind, there’re a new moving company opening soon in the city. Q2 In order to maintain our successful business, Q3 we’re invested in ten more moving trucks and hired some new drivers. The trucks are expected to be here by the end of the month.

question.text: What has the business bought recently?

SPRINGDALE MUSIC CLUB'S
SATURDAY CONCERT LINE UP

5:00 P.M-8:00 P.M Barbeque Cook out,
bring your own meat!
8:00 P.M-9:00 P.M Djubai Djinn,
all the way from East Timor
9:00 P.M-10:00 P.M Swingging Deveils,
touring from Memphis
10:00 P.M-11:00 P.M Rock or Die!
Local heroes
11:00 P.M-12:00 P.M Ferocious Four,
all the way from New York City

answer.explanation:
Transcript:
Q1 Springdale Music Club has just expanded its music selection to include world music artists. We are extremely excited to be able to build on our already impressive offering of domestic recording artists! We'll be having a live performance of international sensation, Djubai Djinn, this Saturday at 8:00 P.M. Come early for the cook out too. Bring your own meats though; we can’t feed everyone! Q3 Djubai Djinn will be signing autographs and selling their own albums and merchandise to help promote their US tour, so be sure you bring your money and your dancing feet! For those of you worried that we may be changing our focus too much, fear not! Q2 Springdale Music Club will still keep a healthy emphasis on rock and roll music, and this Saturday’s concert is no exception with 3 rockin’ acts.

question.text: What is indicated about Springdale Music Club?
choices: (D) They have never carried world music before.

answer.text: (D) They have never carried world music before.

question.text: Look at the graphic. What can you infer about the bands?
choices: (C) The acts following Djubai Djinn play rock and roll.

answer.text: (C) The acts following Djubai Djinn play rock and roll.

question.text: Why does Springdale Music Club ask you to bring your money?
choices: (C) To help support Djubai Djinn’s US tour

answer.text: (C) To help support Djubai Djinn’s US tour

answer.explanation: Do you regularly use videoconferencing to connect with colleagues working in other locations? Well, then Connectivity 3.0 is the program for you. Q1 With Connectivity 3.0, just download our application onto your smartphone or tablet and you're ready to immediately join your videoconference. Q3 Visit our Web site to watch a step-by-step video of how easy it is to use. Connectivity 3.0—simplify collaboration.

Transcript:
Welcome to Lake Kitano National Park. Q1 I’m Jane Black, your guide for today. If you look at your map, we’ll start our tour from the Information Center and head to West gate. Q2 Now we usually continue our journey to South gate after a short break, but that path is closed to the public this season. Instead we’ll take the path to East gate and hike up the Kilmore Cliff trail until we reach Lake Kitano. Q3 For those of you who are afraid of heights, Kilmore Cliff is a trail that goes along the 50-meter cliff drop. If you have any concerns please voice them now. Otherwise we’ll begin our tour...

question.text: Who most likely are the listeners?
Look at the map. What place are the listeners unable to go to?
What does the woman mention about Kilmore Cliff?
choices: (C) People who fear heights may not enjoy it.
(D) It is 50 meters from the final destination.

answer.text: (C) People who fear heights may not enjoy it.

answer.explanation: W-Br: Hello, this is Xinyu Wu from the Council for the Arts. Q1 I’m calling to thank you for your generous donation during our recent fund-raiser. Also, Q2 I wanted to ask if you’d like to write something about what inspired you to donate. We’re sending out some promotional material with a schedule of our summer programs soon, and we’re including a few personal stories about what art means to our members and why they think it’s important to support art. Q3 I can stop by your office some morning this week to discuss it with you, if you’d like. I have some meetings near your office building on Tuesday and Wednesday, so let me know if that would work.

Good morning, radio listeners. This is Tim Lester with your Morning Newsflash. Q1 An hour ago, there was a serious collision at the intersection of Smith Avenue and Main street. Traffic is extremely congested and it’s almost impossible to get anywhere downtown. Q2 As a result, tonight’s soccer match has been delayed by two hours to allow spectators time to make it to the stadium. Oh, also remember, during half time there will be a hot dog eating contest. Q3 The winner will receive an airline ticket to Hawaii.
